title: Collect Debugging Information
text_getlog: Open the DirectPass Diagnostic Toolkit to send the files to Trend Micro.
description_how_to_do: You can find the toolkit at the following location:
text_how_to_2: In the menu bar, click Go and then select Go to Folder.
text_how_to_3: Type the folder location shown above and then click Go.
text_how_to_4: In the window that opens, double click DirectPass Diagnostic Toolkit.
text_how_to_5: Wait for the toolkit to finish collecting the logs, and then click Quit.
